backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with OAuth config, user management types, and persistent maps for rooms, games, players, turns, and stats.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summaries of all major frontend components, pages, libs, and UI modules.
frontend/deploy/Caddyfile: Caddy reverse proxy config routing /api to backend canister and all other paths to frontend with caching and security headers.
frontend/deploy/nginx.conf: Nginx reverse proxy config forwarding /api to backend canister and SPA routes to frontend with SSL and caching settings.
frontend/docs/configuration.md: Explains frontend and backend configuration, environment variables, same-origin API behavior, and local dev setup.
frontend/docs/deployment.md: Deployment instructions for local and production IC environments plus reverse proxy setup and verification steps.
frontend/docs/game-snapshot-contract.md: Describes the structure and purpose of the canonical Game Snapshot used for realtime sync and UI rendering.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and root mount element.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, display mode, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements a PWA service worker for caching assets, handling SPA navigation, and supporting reverse-proxy deployments.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's TanStack Router route tree and wraps routing with an OAuth token session provider.
frontend/src/components/dev/BackendDebug: Provides a UI panel to test backend health and Google OAuth start endpoints with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/game/DoubleFinis: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: Renders a game-over card showing the winner, turn count, and buttons for stats, rematch, or a new game.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: A numeric keypad with quick-score chips and optional voice input for entering score values.
Displays a player's name and remaining score, highlighting when the player is active.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting the user to resume or discard a previously saved in-progress game.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: UI for entering up to three darts with multiplier and bull options, displaying selected darts before submission.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Renders a table showing the last five turns, formatting dart details and status icons for busts and wins.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Modal prompting users to confirm or edit voice-recognized score input with OK/Edit actions.
frontend/src/components/rooms/ClaimSeatP: Displays unclaimed player seats and lets authenticated users claim a seat, showing errors and success states.
frontend/src/components/rooms/DisplaySco: Shows either a winner summary when the game ends or live per‑player remaining scores with active player highlighting.
frontend/src/components/rooms/GameSettin: Form for creating a new game, letting users pick mode, double-out, and configure up to four players.
frontend/src/components/rooms/HostLiveSc: Admin scoring UI enabling score submission, undoing turns, and viewing player remaining scores.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RecentTurn: Read‑only table showing the last ten turns with player names, scores, remaining points, and win/bust status.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCodeDi: Displays a room code and provides a button to copy it with visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameDetails.ts: Fetches metadata for a specific game using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameHistory.ts: Fetches a user's game history and paginated game turns via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameRealtime.ts: Manages a realtime WebSocket connection for receiving game snapshot events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyProfile.ts: Fetches the current user's profile to determine registration or profile display state.
Stores Google OAuth tokens in memory only and exposes hooks to access or clear them.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerGameStats.ts: Fetches player game statistics either by game or by user using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Combines Internet Identity and OAuth token handling into a unified session abstraction with sign-in/out logic.
Provides speech recognition support with listening control, transcript capture, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserStats.ts: Retrieves user statistics for the current user or a specified user from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, footer, auth-aware buttons, and service worker registration, rendering routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/lib/adminTokenStorage.ts: Provides localStorage helpers to get, set, and clear admin tokens per room code.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Generates up to three dart checkout suggestions based on remaining score and double-out rules.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Resolves backend base URL to same-origin /api and includes a safe URL join helper.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Implements core game logic, including state structures and turn application with scoring, bust, and double-out rules.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, migrating, and clearing game state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Manages game settings with defaults, validation, sanitization, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes per-player statistics from game history, including averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentages.
frontend/src/lib/playerDisplayName.ts: Utilities to derive display names for players and detect unclaimed player seats.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeEventEnvelope.t: Defines realtime event types, game snapshot schema, and utilities for parsing event envelopes.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeTransport.ts: Implements a WebSocket-based realtime transport with automatic fallback, reconnection, and event parsing.
frontend/src/lib/roomGameApi.ts: Provides async helpers for creating games, adding players, and submitting scores using backend actor calls.
frontend/src/lib/roomsApi.ts: Handles room creation and lookup, including code generation and backend integration.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Parses spoken phrases into numeric dart scores, supporting various English number patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed game info and paginated turns, including fetch logic and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GameHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a user's game history with filters for mode and date, requiring authentication. Fetches paginated game records and allows navigation to individual game details.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Manages gameplay state, score entry, voice input, and real-time updates, supporting both new and resumed games. Renders player info, turn history, and game over handling.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleOAuthRedirectPa: Processes Google OAuth redirect parameters, handles errors, stores the token, and redirects the user accordingly. Shows status screens for processing, success, or failure.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows login options using Internet Identity or Google OAuth and redirects authenticated users to their profile. Handles loading, errors, and dev-mode backend debugging.
frontend/src/pages/MyAccountPage.tsx: Legacy account page that automatically redirects users to the new profile page after a short delay. Shows a simple redirect notice and manual navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays profile and stats when authenticated, otherwise prompts for login or profile creation. Supports sign-out and shows loading states during session or profile fetch.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page handling profile creation, authentication checks, and redirect flow using mutations and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDisplayTvPage.tsx: TV display page showing a read‑only scoreboard with realtime game updates and connection status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/RoomHostScorerPage.ts: Host scoring page for creating or managing a room’s game, handling admin tokens, authentication, and live snapshot updates.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Start screen for creating a local game or setting up/joining a multi‑device room with player and mode configuration.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Statistics page showing computed game stats or a no‑data message, with navigation back to game or home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them to sessionStorage, retrieve them, and clear them from session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite setup with React plugin, environment variable injection, path aliases, dev server proxying, and build output config.
project_state.json: Tracks project architecture, required frontend/backend changes, known issues, and feature state for the Dart Scoring app.
